content: ameeta scarf design by deniss-ayselle firat finished measurements 62 ½ / 159 cm long and 6 / 15 cm wide yarns wisdom yarns poems 100% wool 50 grams 100 meters/109 yards color #585 4 skeins needles size us 8 / 5 0 mm adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge notions yarn needle gauge 19 sts x 26 row in stockinette st gauge is not critical for this project skill level easy pattern stitch multiple of 18 sts and 18 row row 1 rs k2 p2 twice k10 row 2 ws k8 p2 k2 twice p2 row 3 k2 p2 twice k2 p8 row 4 p10 k2 p2 twice row 5 same as row 1 row 6 as row 2 row 7 as row 3 row 8 same as row 4 row 9 k18 row 10 p1 k2 p2 k2 p11 row 11 k1 p8 k2 p2 x twice k1 row 12 p1 k2 p2 x twice k8 p1 row 13 k11 p2 k2 p2 k1 row 14 p1 k2 p2 k2 p11 row 15 same as row 11 row 16 same as row 12 row 17 same as row 13 row 18 p18 ► scarf cast on 38 sts purl one row row 1 rs k1 work row 1 of patt st twice k1 row 2 ws p1 work row 2 of patt st twice p1 continue to work in established pattern stitch knitting the first and last st on rs row and purling them on ws row until the scarf is approx 62 ½ long or until desired length for a wider scarf work more pattern repeats note adding extra pattern repeats will increase the amount of yarn used bind off in st st ► finishing weave in all loose ends ► stitch pattern chart ► abbreviations beg beginning cm centimeters k knit p purl patt - pattern repeat repeat rs right side st st stockinette stitch knit right side row purl wrong side row st s stitch es ws wrong side * repeat instructions after asterisk the specified number of times visit http //knit-easy blogspot com for more knitting patterns email aysel_denis@yahoo com
